name: Happy Chicken Run - Happy Chicken Family Game
name_original: Happy Chicken Run - Happy Chicken Family Game
description:
Happy chicken Rogers wants to eat candies. There are many candies on the chocolate road. He should keep running and jump over the chocolate bar to get more candies. It's a parkour game about the adventure of Happy chicken Rogers~

Happy mrs chicken Molly is Happy chicken Rogers's wife. He loves running and his wife loves laying eggs.

We have designed a lovely appearance for Happy chicken Rogers. He has beautiful colors, handsome tail and round eyes.Happy chicken Rogers is a Super Run Chicken:)

Let's enjoy our best happy chicken game: happy chicken run!
